description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Cannes, France. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Cannes Opulence on the Famous La Croisette with Five Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled and dazzling elegance along the famed La Croisette at Carlton Cannes, a Regent Hotel. Be captivated by breathtaking views of the French Riviera, whether lounging on a daybed at the Carlton Beach Club or savouring moments on the terrace at Riviera Restaurant. Taste Anatolian excellence at Rüya, sip a personalised concoction by expert mixologists at Bar 58, and surrender to pure relaxation by the poolside or under the skilful care of aestheticians at the spa.

hotels.title: Elegant French Riviera Escape in Residential Quarter of Cannes
hotels.description: Experience the best of the French Riviera with a charming stay at La Bastide de l’Oliveraie - an elegant residential retreat a short stroll from Cannes iconic Croisette promenade and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Effortlessly blending timeless beauty with modern luxuries, this beautiful property echoes a Mediterranean ambience - from the coastal-inspired furnishings to the leafy olive trees and blossoming gardens that ensconce the facade. Dine on refined French cuisine at the on-site restaurant, relax with a soothing treatment at the indulgent spa, or wind up to the rooftop and take in gorgeous panoramic views as you soak into the bubbly jacuzzi. When it's time to explore, stroll along the palm-fringed esplanade - stopping by world-class restaurants and haute couture boutiques - or sink your toes into the golden sands as you watch superyachts sail past.

hotels.title: Boutique Cannes Elegance Overlooking the French Riviera with Beachfront Dining
hotels.description: Indulge in the enchanting allure of the French Riviera with a stay at Mondrian Cannes, a haven of luxury nestled in the heart Cannes. Just a few steps from the legendary Boulevard de La Croisette, this elegant retreat blends modern elegance with timeless Riviera charm. Savor modern, Asian-inspired cuisine at Mr. Nakamoto Cannes, or indulge in blissful dining at Hyde Beach Cannes, where golden sands meet the glistening sea. Whether you’re wandering through the iconic Palais des Festivals, home to the world-renowned Cannes Film Festival, strolling through the vibrant Marché Forville, or basking in the warmth of the golden beaches, you’ll be swept away by Cannes' timeless charm.
